table_view module

class table_view.TableView(title: str, students: dict[str, Student], instructors: dict[str, Instructor], courses: dict[str, Course], callback, action_handler: ActionHandler, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Labelframe

A table view for displaying students, instructors, and courses in a Tkinter application.

This class allows for filtering and editing of records.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – The title of the table view.

  • students (dict[str, Student]) – A dictionary of students, keyed by their IDs.

  • instructors (dict[str, Instructor]) – A dictionary of instructors, keyed by their IDs.

  • courses (dict[str, Course]) – A dictionary of courses, keyed by their IDs.

  • callback (callable) – A callback function to be executed after actions.

  • action_handler (ActionHandler) – An instance of ActionHandler to manage actions.

  • args – Additional positional arguments for the parent class.

  • kwargs – Additional keyword arguments for the parent class.

clear_filters()[source]
display_course(keep_filters: bool = False) → None[source]

Displays the course records in the tree view.

Parameters:

keep_filters (bool) – Flag indicating whether to keep the current filters.

display_instructor(keep_filters: bool = False)[source]

Displays the instructor records in the tree view.

Parameters:

keep_filters (bool) – Flag indicating whether to keep the current filters.

display_person(is_student: bool = True) → None[source]

Displays either student or instructor records based on the is_student flag.

Parameters:

is_student (bool) – Flag indicating whether to display students (True) or instructors (False).

display_student(keep_filters: bool = False)[source]

Displays the student records in the tree view.

Parameters:

keep_filters (bool) – Flag indicating whether to keep the current filters.

on_filter_change(var_name, index, mode)[source]

Called whenever a filter value changes, refreshing the displayed records.

Parameters:

  • var_name (str) – The name of the variable that changed.

  • index (int) – The index of the variable that changed.

  • mode (str) – The mode of the change.

on_treeview_click(event)[source]

Detects when a user clicks the ‘Action’ column and performs an action which is to create popoff window for updating content.

Parameters:

event (tk.Event) – The event object containing information about the click event.
